message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $120. It's a great deal, and I'm confident you'll find it very valuable. Let me know what you think!
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I believe I can only pay $100 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement.

Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal, but $100 is just too low for me.  I'm willing to come down to $110, which is still a fair price considering the value of the product. Let's meet in the middle!
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to counter with $105. I hope this brings us closer to reaching an agreement.
